#include <stdio.h>
#define ll unsigned long long int
int main(){
    ll N=0,dis;
    
    while(scanf("%lld",&N)!=EOF)
    {
      ll arr[N];
      dis=0;
      for(int j=0;j<N;j++)
        arr[j] = 0;
        
      for(int j=0;j<N;j++)
      {
        scanf("%lld",&arr[j]);
        dis += arr[j];
        }
        
      for(int j=N-1;j>=0;j--)
        printf("%lld ",arr[j]);
        printf("\n");
        
      printf("%lld\n",dis);
      }
      return 0;
      //system("pause");
      }
